name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.elapsedTime
description: The elapsedTime read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the elapsed time in seconds after the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text started being spoken that the event was triggered at.

refs.name: Web Speech API
refs.description: The definition of 'elapsedTime' in the 'Web Speech API' specification.
